The script /usr/bin/vulnscript is a shell script that copies the contents of the input file (argument $1) to a temporary file in /tmp, then outputs its content, and finally deletes the temporary file.

I will confirm the script PID by running the script under sudo in the background and checking the /tmp directory for the created file.
